name: cypht
tagline: A browser-based email client with unified inbox support
description: Cypht is a lightweight, browser-based email client that supports IMAP, SMTP, and multiple accounts. It offers unified inboxes, module-based views, and customization for self-hosted or remote deployment.

features.title: Multi
features.description: Manage multiple email accounts in one place. Unified inbox experience

features.title: Imap & Smtp
features.description: Full protocol support for sending and receiving. Universal compatibility

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Fast performance with minimal resources. Efficient email management

features.title: Module
features.description: Customize interface with modular components. Tailor to your needs

features.title: Browser
features.description: Access email from any device with a browser. No client installation

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete control over your email interface. Privacy-focused solution
